features: Oat is the first ingredient in this scalp-soothing, clarifying, farm-fresh inspired shampoo infused with apple cider vinegar for gentle cleansing, high shine, volume and balance; adds shine to dull hair

Blended to clean, clarify, and reinforce shine and color vibrancy from root to tip, these farm-to-shower fresh ingredients work together to help promote a healthy scalp environment while enhancing your hair's natural beauty
Sulfate free shampoo, free from dyes and parabens, making it safe for all hair types including color treated hair
We are inspired by nature; our oat is sourced from a small town mill where pride and quality go hand and hand and we do not test our products on animals

Aveeno is a trusted household brand established in 1945 and is best known for its line of skin soothing products, where oat's natural soothing properties are put to work in body, face and scalp applications
body.description: We believe that beautiful hair starts at the root. Soothe and clarify your scalp while adding high shine and volume to your strands with this farm-to-shower inspired Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo. Oat as the first ingredient helps to promote a healthy scalp environment. Infused with apple cider vinegar, this shampoo cleans and clarifies your scalp while adding shine to your hair. The blend of ingredients works to produce a sensational, fresh fragrance. Free from sulfates, parabens and dyes, this product is safe for color-treated hair. We source our oats from a quiet mill located along the rolling hills of the Mississippi River Valley, in a small town where pride and quality go hand-in-hand. We love the way we feel when everything is in balance. That's why we start with oat as the first ingredient. Each blend helps to soothe your scalp and nourish your strands from root to tip. Discover blends made with simple ingredients, from simpler times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars for oily hair
reviews.reviewText: i bought this because i figured it would work best with my oily hair and i wanted something sulfate free. it doesn’t smell bad but doesn’t smell great to me either it really doesn’t have much of a strong smell but it does lather good and you can’t smell the vinegar like you would think. after the first wash it made my hair feel soft and clean and no longer oily. i will keep using to see further results

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All shampoos are the same? Apparently not. Yay!
reviews.reviewText: I never thought I'd be moved to write a review of a shampoo, but this stuff is THAT good. I got the same soothing clean that I'd get with an apple-cider vinegar rinse without the smell and without over drying.My hair has always been "my thing." I'm blessed with a lot of it and people have, in the past, stopped me in the street to comment on how pretty it is. So, you might imagine how I felt when, in the middle of the pandemic, something crazy started happening with my scalp--mostly that I could see WAY more of it. At first, I assumed it was the stress of nearly ending up homeless, but it was still thinning even after we got "rescued." An oral vitamin B complex with biotin seemed to slow the migration a bit, but then I started to notice that my scalp was itchy and I had a fine powder on my hairbrush. [I've never had dandruff and never heard of dandruff causing hair loss anyway.] I have an appointment with a dermatologist, but obviously--these days--that's not a top priority. Still, my head was driving me nuts. Apple cider vinegar (as a rinse) helped, but then I smelled like vinegar until my next shampoo. A clarifying shampoo helped less, but also dried my hair out beyond what a conditioner could fix.And then I found this stuff!Right away, I liked that it had little to no scent. I noticed immediately that my scalp felt more clean while I was washing it. What really made me happy was that, AS I was rinsing it out, I could feel that my hair actually felt clean but not stripped dry. My scalp looks super clean, doesn't itch, and I haven't seen a single speck of "powder" on my hair brush since I started using it (about three weeks/nine shampoos ago). I'm still seeing more scalp than I was two years ago, but at least it's clean and the hair that's there is clean, soft, and shiny. Yay!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product has been working; no itchiness, no flaking. Using it to prevent scalp build up. I think this smells good. The price was right considering it costs more in store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've spent hundreds of dollars on expensive shampoos, conditioners, and hair products trying to achieve soft shiny hair only to be left with a greasy or overly dry disaster. Then I tried this stuff and my hair has never looked better. It's so soft and shines more than it ever has! No greasy weigh down. The smell is nice. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has better cleaning power compared to other products. It's just that the quantity is less for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Dry hair but greasy scalp is happy!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a few of these clarifying shampoos and this has been the best! The smell is not as strong as you would think. It lathers up well and keeps my hair fresher and less greasy for longer than many other brands. I would say its fairly moisturizing.I will continue to use this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Deja mi cabello suave, con brillo y libre de caspa/resequedad. El vinagre es increíble para el cabello. Además tiene un aroma agradable.

My head reacts to everything, anything I have tried makes me itch and flake after the first wash.Wasted so much money and being left with full bottles of shampoo.I could never find a sulfate free anti dandruff/gentle shampoo until now.I will be adding a couple more into my cart so I don't run out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Received an older or different version of the product
reviews.reviewText: Not quite the same as the images that was depicted by the seller and I'm not sure if that's a good thing yet or not, we'll see after using it.
Product was reasonablely priced and quality is good

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Shampoo used for my oily and dull Hair.
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased many hair shampoo's but this shampoo blows it out the door!I recently purchased and tried the Aveeno Apple Cider Vinegar Clarifying Shampoo for Dull and Oily Hair for a little over a week now and I am beyond impressed with the results! As a student who loves staying active with sports and exploring new places through traveling, maintaining healthy hair has always been a challenge due to exposure to different environments. This shampoo has been a game-changer for me.Firstly, the scent of the apple cider vinegar is refreshing and invigorating, making my shower experience truly enjoyable. The formula effectively cleansed my hair, removing all the excess oil and product buildup that tends to accumulate after workouts and outdoor activities. My hair felt incredibly clean and rejuvenated after just one wash.One of the things I appreciate most about this shampoo is its clarifying properties. It effortlessly revived the dullness that had been lingering in my hair, leaving it looking shiny and vibrant. This is a lifesaver, especially when I'm busy with my studies and don't always have time for extensive hair care routines.What sets this product apart is its gentle nature. Despite its clarifying abilities, it didn't strip my hair of its natural oils or leave it feeling dry. Instead, my hair felt soft and manageable, which is crucial for someone who is always on the go and doesn't have time for complicated hair maintenance.
